data.actual_result: Non-square images are squashed to fit the preview. This is not representative of the final result, as clicking the save button will then update it to the correct, cropped preview. Works fine when uploading via the other (Change Icon) button.
data.expected_result: The preview should show a cropped version of the image, rather than a distorted/squashed one. i.e. It should show the same result as when using the "Change Icon" button
data.short_description: Sever icon preview is distorted when using the "Upload Image" button
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Server Settings > Overview - Click "Upload Image" (Not "Change Icon", which appears when hovering over the current icon) - Select an image that isn't square
